2024 年 7 月 11 日星期四 06:01:26 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
为绿色能源而争夺矿物——以及更好的前进之路|萨利姆·阿里萨利姆·阿里To transition to clean energy and green technology like electric cars, the world needs massive amounts of essential minerals. Environmental peacemaker Saleem Ali explains the conflicts already arising between countries rushing to mine and extract these precious minerals — and shows how the world can find a way to cooperate rather than fight resource wars.为绿色能源而争夺矿物——以及更好的前进之路|萨利姆·阿里To transition to clean energy and green technology like electric cars, the world needs massive amounts of essential minerals. Environmental peacemaker Saleem Ali explains the conflicts already arising between countries rushing to mine and extract these precious minerals — and shows how the world can find a way to cooperate rather than fight resource wars. https://www.ted.com/talks/saleem_ali_the_fight_over_minerals_for_green_energy_and_a_better_way_forward?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133752 133752 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 14:47:02 +0000高等教育不00:12:07泰德
连接数字世界和物理世界的人工智能 |阿尼玛·阿南德库玛阿尼玛·阿南德库玛"While language models may help generate new ideas, they cannot attack the hard part of science, which is simulating the necessary physics," says AI professor Anima Anandkumar. She explains how her team developed neural operators — AI trained on the finest details of the real world — to bridge this gap, sharing recent projects ranging from improved weather forecasting to cutting-edge medical device design that demonstrate the power of AI with universal physical understanding.连接数字世界和物理世界的人工智能 |阿尼玛·阿南德库玛"While language models may help generate new ideas, they cannot attack the hard part of science, which is simulating the necessary physics," says AI professor Anima Anandkumar. She explains how her team developed neural operators — AI trained on the finest details of the real world — to bridge this gap, sharing recent projects ranging from improved weather forecasting to cutting-edge medical device design that demonstrate the power of AI with universal physical understanding. https://www.ted.com/talks/anima_anandkumar_ai_that_connects_the_digital_and_physical_worlds?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133759 133759 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:39:12 +0000高等教育不00:09:50泰德
我父亲最后几天的教训|劳雷尔·布莱特曼劳雷尔·布莱特曼"Life is an endless sushi conveyor belt of things that are going to test you and teach you at the same time," says writer Laurel Braitman. Exploring the relationship between bravery and fear, she shares hard-won wisdom on love, loss, self-forgiveness and how to embrace the full spectrum of human emotions.我父亲最后几天的教训|劳雷尔·布莱特曼"Life is an endless sushi conveyor belt of things that are going to test you and teach you at the same time," says writer Laurel Braitman. Exploring the relationship between bravery and fear, she shares hard-won wisdom on love, loss, self-forgiveness and how to embrace the full spectrum of human emotions. https://www.ted.com/talks/laurel_braitman_lessons_from_my_father_s_final_days?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132954 132954 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:48:55 +0000高等教育不00:12:51泰德
农场工人如何对抗酷暑|乔恩·埃斯福梅斯和杰拉尔多·雷耶斯·查韦斯乔恩·埃斯福梅斯和杰拉尔多·雷耶斯·查韦斯Farm labor is hot, backbreaking and dangerous work. To protect workers from extreme heat and workplace exploitation, farmworker Gerardo Reyes Chávez has teamed up with farm manager Jon Esformes for a unique partnership. Learn how their collaborative model is keeping farmworkers safe and creating a blueprint for more modern, humane working conditions for the world's laborers.农场工人如何对抗酷暑|乔恩·埃斯福梅斯和杰拉尔多·雷耶斯·查韦斯Farm labor is hot, backbreaking and dangerous work. Learn how their collaborative model is keeping farmworkers safe and creating a blueprint for more modern, humane working conditions for the world's laborers. https://www.ted.com/talks/jon_esformes_and_gerardo_reyes_chavez_how_farmworkers_are_fighting_extreme_heat?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133969 133969 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:46:01 +0000高等教育不00:15:29泰德
迷幻药可以帮助患者进行治疗吗？ |本杰明·刘易斯本杰明·刘易斯It's time to make psychiatry more psychedelic, says psychiatrist Benjamin Lewis. Sharing results from his clinical trial on psychedelic-assisted therapy, he highlights how group therapy paired with the safe use of psilocybin, a compound found in magic mushrooms, has the potential to improve mental health conditions like depression and burnout.迷幻药可以帮助患者进行治疗吗？ |本杰明·刘易斯It's time to make psychiatry more psychedelic, says psychiatrist Benjamin Lewis. “空白画布”/“同一个世界”|莎拉·伊丽莎白·查尔斯莎拉·伊丽莎白·查尔斯Vocalist and composer Sarah Elizabeth Charles brings her signature, soulful jazz vocals to the TED stage, performing "Blank Canvas" and "One World" alongside guitarist Jordan Peters. “空白画布”/“同一个世界”|莎拉·伊丽莎白·查尔斯Vocalist and composer Sarah Elizabeth Charles brings her signature, soulful jazz vocals to the TED stage, performing "Blank Canvas" and "One World" alongside guitarist Jordan Peters. https://www.ted.com/talks/sarah_elizabeth_charles_blank_canvas_one_world?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:128625 128625 Fri, 05 Jul 2024 14:42:18 +0000高等教育不00:09:41泰德
人工智能时代的魔法与奇迹 |邝大卫邝大卫With AI everywhere you look, you may think you've seen it all. Magician David Kwong suggests otherwise, proposing advancements in technology actually increase opportunities for wonder. In an entertaining performance, he invites an audience member on stage to exhibit the mind-reading magic of ChatGPT — and explores how tech elevates our capacity for awe.人工智能时代的魔法与奇迹 |邝大卫With AI everywhere you look, you may think you've seen it all. Magician David Kwong suggests otherwise, proposing advancements in technology actually increase opportunities for wonder. In an entertaining performance, he invites an audience member on stage to exhibit the mind-reading magic of ChatGPT — and explores how tech elevates our capacity for awe. https://www.ted.com/talks/david_kwong_magic_and_wonder_in_the_age_of_ai?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133770 133770 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 14:46:43 +0000高等教育不00:15:32泰德
民主需要不同意见。以下是如何做得更好 |布雷特·斯蒂芬斯和约丹诺斯·埃约尔布雷特·斯蒂芬斯和约丹诺斯·埃约尔As authoritarian leaders challenge democratic institutions around the world, some people are questioning whether democracy is even the best political system. In a wide-ranging conversation, writer Bret Stephens and social entrepreneur Yordanos Eyoel discuss why democracy is still our best hope — and offer ways we can learn to disagree more effectively in order to strengthen our societies.民主需要不同意见。以下是如何做得更好 |布雷特·斯蒂芬斯和约丹诺斯·埃约尔As authoritarian leaders challenge democratic institutions around the world, some people are questioning whether democracy is even the best political system. In a wide-ranging conversation, writer Bret Stephens and social entrepreneur Yordanos Eyoel discuss why democracy is still our best hope — and offer ways we can learn to disagree more effectively in order to strengthen our societies. https://www.ted.com/talks/bret_stephens_and_yordanos_eyoel_democracy_requires_disagreement_here_s_how_to_do_it_better?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129700 129700 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 14:46:29 +0000高等教育不00:15:19泰德
人工智能的下一步？跳舞机器人|关凯蒂关凯蒂Would you tango with a robot? Inviting us into the fascinating world of dancing machines, robot choreographer Catie Cuan highlights why teaching robots to move with grace, intention and emotion is essential to creating AI-powered machines we will want to welcome into our daily lives.人工智能的下一步？跳舞机器人|关凯蒂Would you tango with a robot? 已经适应气候危机的人们的经验教训|多卡斯·奈舒鲁阿多卡斯·奈舒鲁阿The Maasai people have lived sustainably off the savanna for centuries, raising cattle for sustenance and income. Climate activist Dorcas Naishorua paints a picture of how the climate crisis is threatening their way of life — and calls for local and international support as they're forced to adapt to a changing environment.已经适应气候危机的人们的经验教训|多卡斯·奈舒鲁阿The Maasai people have lived sustainably off the savanna for centuries, raising cattle for sustenance and income. 土壤中铅的隐患|伊薇特·卡布雷拉伊薇特·卡布雷拉There's an invisible health threat right under our feet, says investigative journalist Yvette Cabrera. She digs into the pervasive problem of lead contamination in soil — a particular risk for children in cities — and shares her action plan to map urban soils and help create healthier communities.土壤中铅的隐患|伊薇特·卡布雷拉There's an invisible health threat right under our feet, says investigative journalist Yvette Cabrera.
